numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed a mindset among older generations.
2. Many older people think that the world is the way it is.
3. Many older people think that the hope that the world becomes better is slim.
4. I noticed a mindset among younger people.
5. Many younger people think that they can make the world a better place.
6. Many younger people think that this idea is not far-fetched.
7. I wonder why this difference exists between older people and younger people.
9. I am a part of the younger population.
10. I have a full life ahead of me.
11. I think that my generation has time to make a difference in the world.
12. The headline is: Hope or Nope.
